member.name: T:Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Tax.CalculateCartLinesTaxBlock
member.summary: Defines a block which calculates the Cart lines tax totals. This is intended to be a SAMPLE Tax calculator and not a production supported one. Customers will normally replace this block with a call out to a third party tax calculator.

member.summary: The execute.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Commerce.Plugin.Tax.CalculateCartTaxBlock
member.summary: Defines a block that calculates a Cart tax. This is intended to be a SAMPLE Tax calculator and not a production supported one. Customers will normally replace this block with a call out to a third party tax calculator.

member.summary: The execute.
